html:
1.22.20  4:36 pm   Yo bruh I forgot what I asked you can you tell me what it was

     sure

1.22.20  4:27 pm   what was better, the iphone power block or the mechanical pencil

     could never decide. that is an all star team right there

1.22.20  3:30 pm   what's your favorite song you've made so far?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.22.20  3:00 pm   Make a song about the return of Union Pacific 4014 (the "Big Boy" steam engine) but the catch is that it has to be in the key of E flat major.

     that's not a catch. that's a somewhat arbitrary decision, taken off my shoulders

     Do you accept this challenge, Bill?

     i would but i don't normally disclose details about upcoming songs, if if i was doing it i couldn't say i am

1.22.20  2:50 pm   Is cheese actually just a wild peace of grass?
Or is cheese just a wild peace of leaves? 

     close

1.22.20  2:49 pm   what dimension do you come from?

     regular

1.22.20  2:47 pm   why is 5?

     it is the only logical next step, when considering 1, 2, 3, and 4

1.22.20  2:46 pm   Are horses dogs that actually was foxes that became horses? •>•

     [calculating] Yes, that's exactly right

1.22.20  2:11 pm   Why do carpets not crunch?

     some of them do. you gotta make sure you give it a test crunch in the store before you buy it

1.22.20  2:02 pm   How would you describe your music style?

     let the other person hear a recording of it, on their own, discovered at their own pace and context

1.22.20  1:51 pm   would you like to acquire a big old barn in Podunk where you could set up your drums, paint the inside green for insane green screen effect and basically just go hog freakin wild?

     podunk has changed it's name, it's now bumfuck

1.22.20  1:50 pm   People keep telling me to do my own thing; I'm confused.

     what are the alternatives. what other things could you do, besides your own. make a list

1.22.20  1:40 pm   is math related to science?

     it is used in science

1.22.20  1:03 pm   Opinions on water?

     extremely dry

1.22.20  12:49 pm   Thoughts on New Jersey?

     big and small at the same time. mostly small, but big also

1.22.20  12:34 pm   If I were to make a short film or documentary about me and others spraying fire extinguishers at each other do you think it would get an 100% on Rotten Tomatoes

     i must admit it is possible

1.22.20  12:30 pm   How do I make a friend?

     be the friend you wish to make

1.22.20  12:30 pm   do u want a cool pair of sunglasses we have all the colors

     how about greyscale

1.22.20  12:17 pm   What is our purpose of existence in a unknown place.

     possibly unknown also

      And if we are created then who is he

     who is whom

      and is there any creator for that creator? ∆ 

     we all must have did it together

1.22.20  12:04 pm   What do you think about 10:24?

     it is an anagram of the time you asked this

1.22.20  12:00 pm   its now illegal to lick the moon what will you do?

     lick mars maybe

1.22.20  11:58 am   Gigantic chord?

     chords are actually a way to assist other things in being gigantic

1.22.20  11:57 am   Quiz: the mitochondria is the powerhouse of what?

     absolutely nothing

1.22.20  11:56 am   What is religion?

     sort of like a bait and switch

1.22.20  11:48 am   how often you spend time with internet?

     oh every so often

1.22.20  11:35 am   what's your favorite thing to ferment

     fermentation itself

1.22.20  11:28 am   how do i overcome the overwhelming urge to punch someone 

     caress them gently

1.22.20  11:27 am   Who is Joe?

     your Father

1.22.20  11:27 am   What inspired you to make videos?

      ~~why videos~~

1.22.20  11:00 am   How is the soap working out?

     still can't figure out what the heck it is. i put it under the microscope but it disappeared. now i just have a clean microscope, which is ok

1.22.20  10:50 am   no seriously what were your first words on the internet?

     hi

1.22.20  10:30 am   How many brain cells do you have after making all of those videos? 

     1,000

1.22.20  10:22 am   do you ever get recognized in public,

     sure

     and if so how do you feel about it?

     wasn't me

1.22.20  10:20 am   Being a person of fame, do people ever forget you are a person?

     could happen

1.22.20  10:11 am   what do you think about streaming (your) songs by tv?

     that is a good idea. how do i do that. the computer and the tv are pretty much the same thing now so it's hard to even tell the difference actually

1.22.20  10:04 am   I really like the sound of the electric keyboard that you use in your music, and was wondering what keyboard it is? 

     [Ad space available] your brand here

1.22.20  9:36 am   hello i was watching your 'gotta write something down and it was very good. do you remember how did you make the handwriting part because it looks very neato

     write in real pencil, put it in a scanner, then copy pieces of the white over bits of the text and 'save as' each time, and add a 1 to the end of the file name, erasing a little bit each time. then import the images backwards, then export as video, re-import, and adjust speed as necessary. audio is recorded separately, also using actual pencil on paper

1.22.20  9:12 am   could you eat blades of grass?

     yes but i'm not going to

1.22.20  8:37 am   why r u so iconic

     everything is iconic. iconic means 'normal'

1.22.20  8:10 am   what's the font that you use for the "word art" at the tops of the pages?

     whatever your browser is set to

     I think it's EB Garamond but I think that still looks a little bit off

     check your browser settings

1.22.20  8:07 am   how do you exist

     impossible. it can't be done

1.22.20  6:39 am   Why shouldn't I hate humans?

     because they are you

1.22.20  5:09 am   how would you get jazz brush work sound without recording?

     interesting question. probably impossible. but you can use your jeans if you can't record a snare drum

1.22.20  5:00 am   been thinking a lot abt my relationship w my parents lately. do you think it's possible to love someone and resent them at the same time?

     yes

1.22.20  3:56 am   Politics. What are they?

      basically like huge name tags

     one day i hope to be able to do both at the same time

1.22.20  3:27 am   if i spend 10 minutes a day writing as much music as i can then will i get better at it?

     yes

     i don't believe there is a parrot sound effect

1.22.20  2:43 am   Thoughts on LA?

     a place where business and pleasure can live side by side

1.22.20  2:01 am   what is the greatest sentence ever written, and why do you like it so much?

     i have to keep switching sentences. that's the only thing that does it for me
